metadata.title: Kit: Can the application data memory be expanded?

sections.content:
Question:
Can the application data memory be expanded?
Answer:
Yes, a QSPI external flash memory expansion is provided to store additional audio and application data. Usage of this memory is subject to the specific implementation; our development partners can support you to provide an appropriate solution.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
